import classes from './MealItem.module.css' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm'; const MealItem = props => { const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}`; // toFixed makes sure that we always print two decimals. return (

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • ) } export default MealItem
